import React, { useState, useEffect,useCallback,useRef } from 'react'; import dayjs from 'dayjs' import jwt from '@/util/token' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {isN} from '@/util/fn' import { inject,observer,MobXProviderContext } from 'mobx-react' import s from './index.module.less'; const Detail = ({projh,projr,docs}) => { console.log() return (
{(projh.length>0) &&
应用项目
} {projh.map((item,i)=>
{i+1} {item.date_pub}
)} {(projr.length>0) &&
研究项目
} {projr.map((item,i)=>
{i+1} {item.date_pub}
)} {(docs.length>0) &&
发表论文
} {docs.map((item,i)=>
{i+1} {item.date_pub}
)}
) } export default inject('store')(observer(Detail))
